Entries.breakUp: *gulp* Oh... I guess I should've seen this coming. I'm as worthless as a friend as I am at everything else...$s#$b#I'll... uh... guess I'll see you at the Saloon.
Entries.event_stadium1: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.$6#$b#Me? I get bored with Pelican Town sometimes.#$b#But... I like that you're different. We balance each other out.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.3985: I heard you gave someone a gift today.#$e#You're a really thoughtful person, you know that?
Entries.NPC.cs.4425: Life sure is different since we've been {{RelationshipLabel}}...$s

Entries.NPC.cs.3962: You want to spend *more* time with me? Why would you do that to yourself?$s#$e#No, I... I'm not saying no.$u
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: You want to get to know me better? ...You'll probably like me less the more you learn about me.$u#$e#But I guess I'd like to know *you* better. For as long as it lasts.$6
Entries.NPC.cs.4001: An old buddy from the JojaMart stockroom hooked me up with that fruit. He works for some rare goods merchant now.#$b#It’s to thank you for helping me, uh... How do I put this.$u#$b#Look, I know I put you in a terrible position that night on the cliffs, and I'm sorry. It's not your job to save me, or fix me.$s#$b#The thing is... when people used to tell me that they loved me, that I wasn’t worthless, I figured that was just because they didn’t know me as well as I knew myself.$s#$b#So the fact that, even after you’d seen everything about me I was so ashamed of, you still wanted me in your life...$u#$b#Well. It got the ball rolling. The rest is up to me.$6#$b#What I'm trying to say is... I love you, @. Thank you for being here.$l

I might not even be here right now.#$b#Which would be a shame, because the bird-watching up here is phenomenal!$h"/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Shane "Heh... I... Entries.ExtraDialogue_Town_DumpsterDiveComment_A: Uh... you want me to get you some hand sanitizer or something, {{Random: chickadee, bud, @}}?
Entries.2{{DialogueYear}}: *snort*$6#$b#You've got twigs in your hair, chickadee. You trying to start a new trend?$h#$b#C'mere, I'll get them out for you.$6#$e#*sigh*...Do I even wanna know what you've been up to?$6
Entries.4{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, bud. I was thinking of taking Jas to Zuzu City sometime. Maybe buy her a new dress, some new books, take her to see a movie...$6#$b#I was hoping you'd come with us.$6
Entries.6{{DialogueYear}}: I still can't believe that of all the people in town, you spend so much time with me.$l#$b#*snort* No, I'm not complaining, ya dingus.$h#$b#Just never thought I'd have a friend like you here, is all.$6#$e#Hey, who are you calling a softie!?$10
Entries.winter_7{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, why don't we ditch the Ice Festival this year?#$b#We could just stay in and lay around on the couch.#$e#I'll go if you really wanna go and win the fishing competition, though.#$b#Gotta cheer you on and all that.$6
Entries.8{{DialogueYear}}: Hey. So how's my favorite dork?$6#$e#You doing anything this weekend? I was thinking we could go out and do something fun.$6#$b#Or if you're busy, I could just come over and help you with your animals.$6#$b#I mean, I can if you want me to.$l
Entries.winter_8{{DialogueYear}}: How do they always manage to set the Ice Festival for the coldest, most godforsaken day of the year?$s#$b#I'm wearing four pairs of socks, but I'm pretty sure my toes are gonna freeze off...#$e#Hm... you look like you're freezing, too.#$b#C'mere, we can conserve our body heat if we stay close to each other.$6
Entries.10{{DialogueYear}}: Oooh... my mouf ith numb. I ate way too many pepper popperth.$10
Entries.11{{DialogueYear}}: ...$6#You look really cheerful today. I can't believe that used to annoy me.$6
Entries.14{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, @. Don't take this the wrong way, but I feel awful and I don't wanna talk right now. Sorry.$s#$e#I really don't wanna talk, but I'd like it if you kept me company.
Entries.17{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, tell me about your day. I like hearing about all the stuff you get up to.$6#$q 594431/594432 Shane_story#So what have you been doing lately?#$r 594431 10 story_one#Caring for my crops and animals.#$r 594431 10 story_one#Mining and fighting monsters.#$r 594432 0 story_trash#Digging through people's trash.
Entries.18{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, @. Wanna split a pizza sometime?#$b#I'm talking about Gus's fancy oven-baked pizzas, not my usual microwavable ones.$6#$e#My treat. Don't worry, I can afford to splurge on my favorite dweeb every now and then.$h
Entries.spring_23{{DialogueYear}}: Just so you know, I really, really, really wouldn't mind if you asked Emily to dance tomorrow.$6#$b#She'd get to dance, you'd get to dance, I won't have to dance...$3#$b#It'd be a win-win-win situation, don't you think?$6#$e#Of course I'd dance with you if you asked. I'm just saying, you have friends who *like* dancing.$h
Entries.spring_24{{DialogueYear}}: Oh hey, chickadee.$6#$e#I, uh, I gotta go run some errands before the dance.$3#$e#See you in a bit, @.$6
Entries.winter_25{{DialogueYear}}: %Shane clasps a hand on your shoulder.#$b#Happy Feast, @.$6#$e#Heh, I wish I could stay, but I gotta help with some last-minute prep. See you in a bit, chickadee.$6
Entries.summer_28{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, chickadee.$6#$e#You ready for fall? Marnie's already drafted a schedule of chores at the ranch.#$b#You know, to get ready for the Fair.#$b#I'm gonna be giving lots of animal baths in the next two weeks...$3#$e#Anyway, I'll see you tonight.$6
Entries.story_one: Sounds exhausting. If you need to take a break, just lemme know and I'll bring you some food or something.$6
Entries.story_trash: ...Huh. I was not expecting that.#$e#*sigh*... of course my best friend would be the town dumpster diver.$3
Entries.Shane_story: #$p 594431#You haven't been overworking yourself, have you?|Unless you've been digging through people's garbage again. I don't wanna hear about that, you weirdo.$h

Entries.ExtraDialogue_Town_DumpsterDiveComment_A: Uh... you want me to get you some hand sanitizer or something, {{Random: chickadee, bud, @}}?
Entries.2{{DialogueYear}}: *snort*$6#$b#You've got twigs in your hair, chickadee. You trying to start a new trend?$h#$b#C'mere, I'll get them out for you.$6#$e#*sigh*...Do I even wanna know what you've been up to?$6
Entries.4{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, bud. I was thinking of taking Jas to Zuzu City sometime. Maybe buy her a new dress, some new books, take her to see a movie...$6#$b#I was hoping you'd come with us.$6
Entries.6{{DialogueYear}}: I still can't believe that of all the people in town, you spend so much time with me.$6#$b#*snort* No, I'm not complaining, ya dingus.$h#$b#Just never thought I'd have a friend like you here, is all.$6#$e#Hey, who are you calling a softie!?$10
Entries.winter_7{{DialogueYear}}: Hey, why don't we ditch the Ice Festival this year?#$b#We could just stay in and lay around on the couch.#$e#I'll go if you really wanna go and win the fishing competition, though.#$b#Gotta cheer you on and all that.$6
Entries.8{{DialogueYear}}: Hey. So how's my favorite dork?$6#$e#You doing anything this weekend? I was thinking we could go out and do something fun.$6#$b#Or if you're busy, I could just come over and help you with your animals.$6#$b#I mean, I can if you want me to.$6
Entries.winter_8{{DialogueYear}}: How do they always manage to set the Ice Festival for the coldest, most godforsaken day of the year?$s#$b#I'm wearing four pairs of socks, but I'm pretty sure my toes are gonna freeze off...#$e#Hm... you look like you're freezing, too.#$b#C'mere, we can conserve our body heat if we stay close to each other.$6
Entries.10{{DialogueYear}}: Oooh... my mouf ith numb. I ate way too many pepper popperth.$10
Entries.11{{DialogueYear}}: ...$6#You look really cheerful today. I can't believe that used to annoy me.$6

Entries.Shane0: Are you sure you know what you're getting yourself into?$6#$b#You know I'll do my best for you, but I'll still be the same jerk with the same baggage... not to mention that I have Jas to take care of...$3#$b#You really want this?#$e#Don't get me wrong, I do want this. I want this so bad, and I just... I really need this to work, @.#$b#So... if you're absolutely sure that you wanna spend the rest of eternity with this hot mess, then let's do this.$6#$e#This is... this is real, right? I mean, this is actually happening?$6#$e#Yoba, I don't know how to tell you how I feel right now.$l#$b#Heh... I guess I've got the rest of our lives to figure out how to tell you, right?$l#$e#You know what, I'm gonna go before I get even sappier. Gotta save some of that mushiness for the ceremony, right?$6#$e#@, my bud, my favorite person in the universe... I'd love to spend the rest of the day finding more ways to say that, but we both have stuff to do.$l#$b#Go on, get outta here!$h
Entries.Shane1: I talked to Marnie and Jas last night. They kinda freaked out and took over the commitment ceremony prep.$h#$b#They cried a lot. Happy tears, of course. They're really, really happy for us, @.$l#$e#Jas is also pretty excited to come hang out on the farm. Do you think we should set up a room for her?$6

Entries.JojaMart: Hm? Oh, hey. Miss me already?$6

Entries.Good_1: {{Random: Have I ever told you that Jas thinks you're the coolest grown-up ever?$6#$b#Don't worry, I won't tell her what a huge dork you really are.$h ++ Hey, feel my shirt... It's made of boyfriend material.$h#$b#How do you think that one would go over with Emily? She likes fabrics, right?$6 |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Good_2: {{Random: Hey, I was thinking we should have Jas and Marnie over for lunch sometime. They'd like that, wouldn't they?$6#$e#I'll probably get Gus to make us something, though. I don't wanna take any chances with my cooking. ++ Morning, chickadee. Lookin' good!$6 |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Good_3: Sometimes I feel like I'm really getting it together. I get all these chores done, I spend time with my family...#$b#It's nice. I'm feeling pretty proud of myself.$6
Entries.Good_5: {{Random: I'm in a great mood today... The Tunnelers won big last night.$h ++ A little bit before we became {{RelationshipLabel}}, I got these really sappy dreams about you.$6#$b#Yoba, I was so embarrassed about them. I had it in my head that it was weird to care that much about someone I wasn't dating.$3#$e#I kinda freaked out whenever I saw you afterwards, you know. Like I was scared you'd read my mind or something.$6#$e#Yeah, I do still have dreams about you every now and then. Not that big a deal to me, though...#$b#I know you're way sappier in real life.$h |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Good_7: {{Random: Hey, @. Could you stay with me for a little bit?#$b#Today feels really heavy...$s ++ I'm glad that we were neighbors before I moved in.$6#$b#It doesn't feel like I moved out and left Jas and Marnie behind. It's more like my home just got a lot bigger, you know?$6#$e#I hope you feel the same way. What's mine is yours, and all that.$6#$b#Besides, Marnie and Jas have been bugging me about getting you to visit more often.$h |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Good_8: {{Random: *Sniff*... *sniff*... what's that wonderful fragrance? Eau de pepperoni?$6#$e#I'm kidding, I'm kidding.$h#$e#Seriously, though, do you smell pizza somewhere? ++ Sometimes I get scared that us being {{RelationshipLabel}} is all a really great, elaborate fever dream. Like any minute I'll wake up in a hospital bed with a doctor telling me that I've been asleep for ten years.#$b#Maybe I've just been watching too many movies...$3#$e#Or maybe you're too good to be true, and I still can't believe that I'm the one who gets to share your life.$l |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Neutral_0: {{Random: Why don't you tell me about your day later? I'm kind of busy right now... ++ Hey, are we doing okay on money, @? |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Outdoor_1: {{Random: Hey, @. I went for a morning walk around the farm before you got up. Everything looks fine.$6 ++ Ooohh... my tongue is swollen from eating too many pepper poppers.$s |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: {{Random: Hey. Take this... I didn't feel like cooking today, so I just nuked some breakfast. [195 215 206]#$e#Sorry if it's squishy.$6 ++ Is that tomato sauce on your chin? Someone's been nibbling on pizza rolls.$6 |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.funReturn_Shane: {{Random: Phew, I'm all sweaty... That was a pretty long walk...#$b#*sigh* Today was nice. I'm wiped out, though...$6#$e#Why don't you tell me about your day?$6 ++ Hey, you won't believe what I saw on the walk home. I'll tell you about it next time you have a free minute. |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: {{Random: Take this... [773]#$e#I know you like to head into the caves on days like this. Come home in one piece, @. ++ Ugh... I woke up to water dripping on my face. Of course a leak would pop up right above the bed.$s#$e#I'll get it fixed as soon as I can. I think my pillow's already soaked through. |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: {{Random: ...I'll never get used to how cheerful you look after working outside in the rain all day.$6 ++ Well, you're completely soaked. I figured you'd forget to bring an umbrella again.#$b#*sigh*... Go on, I already drew you a bath. As if I'll let you get sick from the rain.$6 |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: {{Random: *sigh*... I hope Jas doesn't get any nightmares tonight. The rain has a way of setting her off...$3#$e#I'm gonna give her a call. I'll talk to you a bit, bud.$6 ++ The tip-tappa-tip of the rain takes me to a different time... a different place.$3#$e#*sigh*... Memories sure have a way of just barging in whenever they feel like it. |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.spring_23: Oh, right. It's the Flower Dance tomorrow. Hey, if it makes you happy, I'm happy.$6#$e#Besides, if I have to dance, at least it's with my dork of a best friend.$h
Entries.summer_11: Morning, chickadee. You ready for the biggest buffet of the year?$h#$e#I got you a pair of stretchy shorts, in case you wanna wear them. For comfort, you know?$6#$e#...Damn, we're not turning into the kind of {{RelationshipLabel}} that wear matching outfits, are we?$10#$b#...$3#$b#Oh well, I guess I don't mind. It's not like we're doing this to be cutesy or whatever.$6
Entries.winter_7: Wanna ditch the Ice Festival tomorrow? We could stay in, make some hot drinks, and play a game or something...$6#$e#I'll obviously go if you're going, though. Gotta support my best friend.$6

Entries.winter_8: Hey, be sure to bundle up today.#$e#I don't want you freezing your toes off or whatever if we're gonna be hanging out on some godforsaken ice disk all day.$6
Entries.Good_4: {{Random: Hey, you know I love you, right?$6#$b#I just wanna make sure you never forget.$6 ++ Ugh... I just wanna crawl back into bed...$s#$b#I'll just stay in today, okay? I don't feel up to anything at all...#$e#Have a good day out there, bud.$6 |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.winter_28: Well, we've made it through another year.$6#$b#I know I don't say it enough, but I hope you know how grateful I am that we went through it with each other.$6#$e#Happy new year, @. I love you.$6

Entries.Good_6: {{Random: Ah, don't hug me. I haven't showered yet and I don't wanna expose you to that.$6#$b#I've, uh, had some trouble getting myself to do anything this morning.$3 ++ So picture this: I'm just getting on with my day, doing chores and stuff... when my pendant swings into view.#$b#*sigh*... You know how distracting this thing is? I keep getting all emotional whenever I lay my eyes on it.#$e#Take it off?$10#$b#Yeah, I get that it's the practical thing to do, but the only way to get this pendant off me is to pry it off my cold, dead body.#$b#I'm not taking it off for anything.$6 |inputSeparator=++}}

{{Random: Ah, don't hug me. Entries.Good_9: {{Random: If someone told me before we met that this is what my life would be like, I would've told them that they were wrong.#$b#I'm glad that *I* was wrong, though.$6 ++ Huh... You're wondering why I have this goofy grin on my face? I was just thinking about how my life turned out.$h#$e#I can't believe I went from that dead-end job at Joja to living on a farm with my best friend, a stone's throw from Jas and Marnie's place.$6#$e#I'm not always in a place to appreciate it, but... yeah. I'm glad I'm here.$6 |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.Outdoor_0: {{Random: I didn't sleep well last night, so I'm hoping this fresh air will get the juices flowing. ++ Sometimes I stop and realize that I'm nothing more than a bag of juicy, squishy flesh.#$e#But hey... that's just fine... what's life, anyway?$h |inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.winter_8: Hey, be sure to bundle up today.#$e#I don't want you freezing your toes off or whatever if we're gonna be hanging out on some godforsaken ice disk all day.$6

Entries.Bad_0: Did I do something to tick you off?#$b#Or what, are you just tired of me and my baggage?#$e#I warned you, @. I told you that I'm a mess, but no, you went ahead and moved me in anyway.#$b#You knew exactly what you were getting into when you asked me to be {{RelationshipLabel}}. So if you regret anything, that's on you.$a
Entries.Bad_1: ...Can we still fix this?$s#$b#Not that I have much experience, but I'm pretty sure this isn't how being {{RelationshipLabel}} is supposed to work.#$e#Please... I just want us to go back to how we were before.$3
Entries.Bad_3: Are you gonna kick me out? Is that why you've been so distant lately?$s#$e#I'm... I'm doing the best I can for you, you know.#$b#I'm sorry it isn't enough, but it's the best I can do...$s#$b#Please don't abandon me. I'll try harder, @. I'll do whatever you want me to, just... just talk to me. Tell me what you want from me.#$e#...I want to fix this, @. Do you?$3
Entries.Bad_5: You were my best friend once, you know?#$b#Yoba, we just had to mess that up by living together, didn't we?$s
Entries.Bad_6: Did you ever really care about me? Do I mean anything to you?$s#$b#Or was asking me to move in just some act of charity you couldn't back out of?$a
Entries.Bad_7: You know, if I knew that living with me would make you so miserable, I wouldn't have said yes.#$e#You said I'd make you happy, jerk! And damn if I'm not trying my hardest to do that, but you're just completely checked out of our friendship.$a

Entries.Bad_0: Do you even still care about me?#$b#Heh, well, you make it easy to forget that you do...$s
Entries.Bad_2: I think I'm starting to get what people mean when they say that they've drifted apart.$s#$e#Never thought it'd happen to us, but hey, here we are.
Entries.Bad_7: Sometimes I think of what it would have been like if I didn't move in with you.$3#$b#We were really good friends before we were {{RelationshipLabel}}. I almost wish we could go back to how things were back then.

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Shane: When we met, I showed you all the worst parts of me...$3#$b#And you chose to stick with me, anyway."/pause 500/speak Shane "Then you chose to be with me and... and love me. Even though you see who I am.$3#$b#Or maybe because you see me.$6"/pause 1000/speak Shane "You didn't quit on me, and I'm never gonna quit on you...#$b#...Even if you fart in your sleep.$6"/pause 100/emote farmer 12/pause 200/speak Shane "I'm kidding, I'm kidding.$h"/pause 1000/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "Looking out at all this...$6#$b#I just--"/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "I see you too, you know?$6

We love each other.$l"/emote farmer 32/emote Shane 32/speak Shane "...So, uh... who else are we waiting for? Is Vincent coming too?$6"/pause 250/speak Jas "Nope! He and Miss Penny already celebrated with me yesterday. We went looking for shells at the beach.#$b#So today is just for family.$4"/emote farmer 20/pause 250/speak Marnie "Well, let's go and eat before the ants get to all our food!$h"/jump Jas/textAboveHead Jas "Can I have some cake?"/move Jas 0 -3 0 true/pause 500/move Marnie 0 -2 3 true/move Shane 0 -4 3 true/speak Shane "That pizza does look really good...$6"/move Shane -3 0 3 true/move Jas -2 0 0 true/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Jas told us all about what she was learning at her tutoring sessions.#Later, Marnie admitted that she just bought all our food from the saloon.#It was a lot of fun!"/end dialogue Jas "Thanks for coming, {{Auncle}} @.#$e#Weren't those flowers pretty?$h"/end dialogue Marnie "Don't be a stranger now, dear. We are family, after all.$h"/end dialogue Shane "Heh, looks like I've got some stiff competition in Jas's 'favorite grown up' department.$6"

Entries.GiftReaction_Hot_Pepper: Hell yes, this is the good stuff. Thanks, @!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Hot_Pepper~1: Have I told you that I love you? I love you, this is great.$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Hot_Pepper~2: Seriously, I could eat these all day. Thanks, @.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Hot_Pepper~3: Aw, now you're just spoiling me. I'm just drowning in hot peppers here.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pizza: Hell yes, this is the good stuff. Just look at that sauce... Thanks, @!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Pizza~1: Oh man, the cheese is all bubbly and stringy... I love this. Thanks, @.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pizza~3: Have I told you that you're my favorite person in the universe? I should tell you that more often.#$b#Ah, this smells so good. Want a slice?$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pepper_Poppers: Oh man, do I wanna eat these now or save them for later? Decisions, decisions.$3#$b#Eh, I'll figure it out. Thanks, @.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pepper_Poppers~1: Hoo, these look crispy. You're the best, @.$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Pepper_Poppers~3: You know me too well, @. Thanks.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pepper_Poppers~4: Ugh, I just can't get enough of these poppers. Thanks, @!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Prismatic_Shard: Thanks, but you know you don't need to shower me in ridiculously expensive gems, right?$6#$b#I mean, I'm not complaining, but I'd be just as happy with a pizza or something.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pearl: Thanks, but you know you don't need to shower me in ridiculously expensive gifts, right?$6#$b#I mean, I'm not complaining, but I'd be just as happy with a pizza or something.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Golden_Pumpkin: Huh... so this is what you get from finishing the hedge maze?#$b#Thanks.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Magic_Rock_Candy: This is just way too fancy to be real candy. Do rich people seriously eat this?#$b#I mean, I appreciate it. Thanks, @.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Rabbit's_Foot: Heh. I do look like I need some luck, don't I?#$b#Thanks, @.$6
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-5: Oh hey, is this from your hens? Thanks, @.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pink_Cake: Hey, this is Jas and Marnie's favorite. You mind if I share it with them?$6#$b#Thanks, @.
Entries.GiftReaction_Diamond: Oh, is this a diamond? Marnie loves these.$6#$b#Is it okay if I pass this to her?$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Farmer's_Lunch: Hey, I'm pretty sure Marnie loves this dish. Would you mind if I shared?$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Pumpkin_Pie: Oh man, Marnie loves pumpkin pie. Hope you won't mind if she ends up eating most of this.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Plum_Pudding: Hey, is this plum pudding? Jas loves this stuff!$h#$b#I'm gonna share this with her, if you don't mind.$6
Entries.GiftReaction_Fairy_Rose: Oh, thanks. I think I'll stick these in Jas's room or something. She just loves these.$6

Entries.Tue10: Emily and I are just friends right now.#$b#I wouldn't mind changing that... Then again, it's worked out really well for me and you.$l
Entries.summer_Tue10: Maybe I fell for Emily a little bit, at one point or another...$u#$e#That's not the most important thing to me, though. I don't think romantic stuff always needs to come first.#$e#Jas is priority one. After that, I guess it's a tie between Marnie and you.$l

Entries.Indoor_Day_2: #$c .5#You know what? I think I've lost some weight since moving in with you.$6#Does it ever annoy you that I don't have as much energy as you do?
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Buh... I wish I was six inches taller and a whole lot smarter...#$b#But you like me anyway? I still have a hard time understanding that...
Entries.Outdoor_4: #$c .5#Hey, @. I went for a morning walk around the farm before you got up. Everything looks fine.#I don't know why, but I'm just feeling pretty good this morning. I must've slept well.$h
Entries.Good_0: Today's a good day. I have a lot more of those than I used to.$6
Entries.Good_1: You're a better person than me, you know that? I'm glad you put up with me.$6
Entries.Neutral_2: Why don't you tell me about your day later? I'm kind of busy right now...
Entries.Outdoor_0: I didn't sleep well last night, so I'm hoping this fresh air will get the juices flowing.
Entries.Bad_8: Yeah... *hic* ... Sure, pal. Whatever you say... *hic*

Entries.summer_17: How do people like you and Marnie just keep it together all the time? I don't even know where I'd be if Marnie hadn't taken in Jas... and me.$s#$e#Well, and then you came along.$6

Entries.Indoor_Day_3: #$c .5#Is that tomato sauce on your chin? Someone's been nibbling on pizza rolls.$6#You're looking bright-eyed and bushy-tailed this morning.$6
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: #$c .5#I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I appreciate all the work you do. I'm lucky to have a friend like you.$6#Give me something positive to focus on. I know it should feel like a good morning; I just need some help getting there.
Entries.funReturn_Shane: #$c .5#Phew, I'm all sweaty... That was quite a walk... Buh, I'm out of shape.$6#Yeah, I had a good time going out. Don't worry, though. I was good.
Entries.winter_28: Well, another year gone by... I feel a little older...#$b#...but you seem as full of pep as ever.$6

Entries.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 10 2 Shane 19 10 1 Marlon 18 10 3/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " {{TermofEndearment}}, wake up!"/viewport 19 10 true/pause 1500/speak Shane "Hey. There we go... Are you okay?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Shane "I just had a bad feeling and came to find you. At first, I thought it was just the regular anxiety, but then when it wouldn't go away, I knew something was up.$3#$b#Good thing we came by. Passed out face-down in the mud really doesn't suit your cool image, you know.$6"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "And I simply came along to clear a path for Shane while we brought you back up to the surface.#$b#At first, I was to venture in alone, but he insisted on coming along.#$b#You're blessed to have ended up sharing your life with someone so courageous."/emote Shane 16/pause 500/speak Shane "I'm not courageous at all. I'm just a guy with a best friend he can't afford to lose. That's all. $2"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "It's in my nature to be frank. I'm simply stating the fact of what I saw. You did well, standing by my side."/pause 500/move Marlon 0 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Marlon 3/speak Marlon "At any rate, it's best to leave for now. @ needs to rest and recuperate. You two shouldn't linger."/pause 500/textAboveHead Marlon "Farewell."/move Marlon 0 4 0/warp Marlon -100 -100/pause 1500/speak Shane "Hey... we should go home and grab something to eat. You've had a rough day today.#$b#You can come back another time to finish what you started, okay?$6#$b#Even the toughest fighters need to take a break sometimes. And anyway, we both know you'll make short work of whatever got you today the next time you're down there.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 0/pause 500/minedeath/end dialogue Shane "Hey, glad you made it.
